page.title: 01WALSDEN A Summary.
page.content: {Walsden}is a village near {Todmorden,}which has two schools and a church called St.Peters. There is a Post Office and a few shops. There is a railway and a canal and a busy main road. The River Calder runs alongside our school. Even though it is a small village, it is busy with quite a few small industries. There is a cricket club and some playing fields where football is played sometimes. One of most popular features of Walsden is the Garden Centre where people come from miles around to buy their seeds and plants. Living in{Walsden}is quite like being in the countryside, especially where I live now. The nearest big city to{Walsden}is{Manchester,}which is in Lancashire 20 miles away.{Walsden}is just inside{Yorkshire.}
